price: It will only be a single Blast[4], and at once they will be looking around.
arabic: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجۡرَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ فَإِذَا هُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ
footnotes: [4] i.e., the second blow of the Trumpet.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
